name: Lilium
goal: Lilium is a global industry leader in eVTOL air taxis, having tested the first full-scale eVTOL transition aircraft in the world in 2017 (two-seater) and a new five-seater air taxi prototype in 2019. Lilium's mission is to bring individual, clean and affordable air travel to everyone.
euInitiatives: Development of the U-Space regulatory framework, EASA Basic Regulation certified drones
